name: @formatjs/intl-listformat
description: Formats JS list in a i18n-safe way
author: Long Ho <holevietlong@gmail.com>

scripts.build:additional: tsc -p tsconfig.esm.json && tsc -p tsconfig.es6.json && api-extractor run --local && rollup -c rollup.config.js
scripts.build: npm run build:cjs && npm run build:additional
scripts.jest: cross-env NODE_ICU_DATA=../../node_modules/full-icu TS_NODE_PROJECT=tsconfig.json cross-env NODE_ENV=test jest
scripts.test: npm run jest && cross-env NODE_ICU_DATA=../../node_modules/full-icu TS_NODE_PROJECT=tsconfig.json ts-node tests/runner
